article.headline: Drexel 81, Villanova 76
article.story: VILLANOVA, Pa. (AP) -- Bashir Mason scored 21 points and Frank Elegar added 14 points and 11 rebounds as Drexel beat Villanova for the first time, 81-76 Saturday night. Drexel (6-2) ended a 17-game losing streak to the Wildcats in a series that dates to 1924. The Dragons, who have faced Villanova just twice since 1990, extended their overall winning streak to four. Curtis Sumpter had 31 points and 10 rebounds for Villanova (7-2), which had its five-game winning streak halted. Elegar scored on follow-up with 4:12, breaking a 71-all tie, and Drexel held the lead the rest of the way. Mason sliced through the lane and scored on a runner, and Elegar hit a jump hook to give the Dragons a 77-71 lead with 2:44 remaining. Drexel's Chaz Crawford grabbed two crucial offensive rebounds in the final minute to help protect a three-point lead. Mason added a pair of free throws with 13.8 seconds left to help put the game out of reach. Drexel didn't back down Villanova in the back-and-forth game. Villanova seemingly took control in the first half with a 15-0 run for a 41-33 lead. Shane Clark started and ended the run with a 3-pointer. Sumpter scored 12 points in the first half, while Elegar led Drexel with 10.

statistics.name: points
statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.name: fieldGoals
statistics.description: Field Goal makes and attempts.

statistics.name: freeThrows
statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).
